title: BUSINESS PARTNER AFFILIATION
description: Business Partner to Business Partner Affiliation describes the relationship between two Business Partners.

defaultRelationship.title: defaultRelationship
defaultRelationship.description: If you have a relationship of the same kind multiple times (e.g. more then 1 ship to partners) this flag defines the Default Partner for this dedicated Business Partner Affiliation Type.

positionName.title: positionName
positionName.description: BP Affiliation with an affiliation type like employment or contact person may have the Position Name as additional information.

startDate.title: startDate
startDate.description: The Start Date indicates when the Business Partner Affiliation begins.

endDate.title: endDate
endDate.description: The End Date indicates when the Business Partner Affiliation finishes.

typeCode.title: affiliationType.code
typeCode.description: The Code identifies the type of a relationship but not the direction of that relationship.

typeDescription.title: affiliationType.description
typeDescription.description: The description text for a specific AFFILIATION TYPE including additional information about the direction of the relation.

sourceBusinessPartnerId.title: sourceBusinessPartnerId.identifier
sourceBusinessPartnerId.description: Internal or External (alternative) Identifier of the Business Partner.

targetBusinessPartnerId.title: targetBusinessPartnerId.identifier
targetBusinessPartnerId.description: Internal or External (alternative) Identifier of the Business Partner.
